section.para: To view the records of posted cash Receipts, go to Accounting > Accounts Receivable > Reports > Deposits Register. The following screen will appear:
When displaying the deposits register, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Cash receipts posted on and after this date will be displayed.
Cash receipts posted on and before this date will be displayed.
Display lists posted cash receipts, using the specified parameters. The totals for the received and receivables application amounts will display at the bottom of the screen.

note.para: The balance due amount displayed here refers to any open amount remaining on the open receivable which the cash receipt was applied to. No balance due will appear for prepaid transactions.
